summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4099 for the improvement of Franklin Avenue, from East Howe Street to East Newton Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 49235, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
